divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside totalk on the phone and glanced over my neighbors house and a red orb thing caught me eye, i thought oh plane but it was moving too slow, and it would go up down, left right change colors strobe like a strobe light....i got my neighbor out she started watching it with me, we got a 3rd neighbor, and eventually a 4th...i would say we watched this and many more(that wernt as doninate) from around 1110-230...it was crazt, one friend got a second of it on tape
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: my friends and i watched more than one object for hours that would move all directions and flash red/gree/white
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fort Hood
There were 2 other sightings in Fort Hood on or around July 23rd 2008
